trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the deletion of a row in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow> event handler, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 에 있는 행의 삭제를 취소 하려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow>설정 하는 이벤트 처리기는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>속성을 `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 사용](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs"></xref> class.
This constructor uses the `dataGridViewRow` parameter value to initialize the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs.Row%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 `dataGridViewRow` 매개 변수 값의 값을 초기화 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs.Row%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs.Row%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row the user is deleting.
Gets the row that the user is deleting.
The row that the user deleted.
